summary: Intro Music Replacement Project or IMPR for short replaces Skyrim\'s default maintheme whit sounds i had record from within the game of Skyrim, there is also one soundtrack i had made by mixing some sounds together.
descriptionHtml:
Intro Music Replacement Project or IMPR for short replaces Skyrim\'s default maintheme whit sounds i had record from within the game of Skyrim.

There are 3 type\'s of soundtrack you can download.
If you are unsure of what one to pick there is some videos i had made to make it more easy for you:)


Troat of the World
Riverwood at Night
Skyrim\'s life ( i had made this soundtrack by mixing some sounds together that i had on my PC)

More Audio soundtrack and custem soundtrack will be add as we past after the day of Yule (Xmas)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\music\\special

If the Music/special folder is not there just make one and place the XWM file into the special folder.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Uninstall

Just remove the XWM file from the special folder.
author: CrazyWolfGamer
